comment: Really cares about students. Has strict policies, but thats ok. Uses ALEKS which KSU decides on that. makes great teaching videos! TAKE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Professor Morgan is very good at communicating through email and always answers all of my questions. She ensured I felt at ease while taking her class and always offered helpful tips!
Learning the subjects were very easy, I get very bored of listening someone teach it, but her giving ALEKS to do allowed me to do it myself and learn it very quickly.

Professor Morgan has very strict ways for test taking, but it is very accessible through emails. She is very helpful and uploads videos to D2L going over topics before tests. She cares for her students.
